messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Unity.UnityHook.D: Calls Unity Monkeys after the first scene has been loaded.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.EngineIn: Calls Resonite Monkeys after FrooxEngine is ready and when it gets shut down.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.BrotliPa: Makes the Brotli library look for its native DLL in the right place.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.ConfigSe: Generates the data feed items for the config sections of the mods.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.ModMetad: Generates data feed items for the mod metadata.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.ModSetti: Allows creating working standalone facets from MonkeyLoader Mod Settings items.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.MonkeyLo: Generates data feed items for the root MonkeyLoader category.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.NonToggl: Generates data feed items for the non-toggleable monkeys.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.SaveConf: Generates data feed items to save and reset the config sections of the mods.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Settings: Generates fallback locale messages for the mod settings.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Toggleab: Generates data feed items for the toggleable monkeys.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.InstantR: Controls the option to immediately flush every message in Resonite's log by proxying its enabled state to it.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Fallback: Sends out the Fallback Locale Generation event for monkeys to programmatically generate (English) locale messages for necessary keys that weren't covered already.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.FileSyst: Automatically loads locale files from the mods' file systems.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.LocaleDa: Sends out the Locale Generation event for Monkeys to load locale messages.
Allows selecting locales that don't directly map to a known culture code, as long as they're still based on a known code.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.ModFallb:
Adds a button to the setting pages of mods that allows exporting their programmatically generated locale messages.
As this is for development purposes only, it's disabled by default.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.ModLocal: Ensures that mods' locale messages show up as the (English) fallback value for users without the mod adding them.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.PluginLo: Fixes an assembly resolving issue in plugin loading.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Resonite: Sends the FrooxEngine UniLog messages to the MonkeyLoader Console when available.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.ContextM: Sends out the Context Menu Items Generation event when it is opened through the Extension methods on Users (i.e. for buttons, drag and drop, etc.).
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Interact:
Sends out the Context Menu Items Generation event when it is opened by the Interaction Handler (i.e. using with the controller, keyboard, or mouse).
If any entries are added in an update, this monkey can be disabled to get access - though it will prevent the extra Context Menu settings and events from working.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.CustomIn: Sends out the Build Inspector Body / Header events to make the Worker Inspector UI generation modular.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.DefaultB: Generates the default member editors for inspectors.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.DefaultI: Handles creating the default UI elements of the Worker Inspector header.
Adds the default inspector header text to worker inspectors.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.SyncMemb: Sends out the various Build Member Editor events to allow monkeys to override the generation of them.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.ButtonDe: Turns the SyncDelegate targeted by a Button into a locale key to display as a tooltip.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.ButtonTo: Adds tooltip resolve requests to UIX Buttons.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.CommentT: Resolves the tooltip for a button based on a Comment component's text starting with 'TooltipperyLabel:'.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Hyperlin:
Resolves the tooltip for a button based on a Hyperlink component's URL and reason.
They may be added on to another tooltip for the button.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.TooltipM: Sends out tooltip resolve requests from different sources. The tooltip system is based on the Tooltippery mod originally created by Psychpsyo.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Unity.Un: Makes the mod loading process appear on the loading screen in the Unity build of Resonite.
